item.title: Can you?
item.dc:creator: @ScottCheese ScottCheese
item.description:
@ScottCheese wrote:

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“myell”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
try {

		String announcement = command.substring(8);
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll ="[MOD]""+playername+:"+command.substring(8);
		sendMessage("You have successfully sent an announcement.");

		} catch(Exception e) {
		sendMessage("Wrong syntax! Use ::myell [MOD].");
		}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Can you?
item.dc:creator: @_O_Wowzers :O Wowzers!
item.description:
@_O_Wowzers wrote:

[quote=“sgt yoshi, post:6, topic:194515”]Wowzers, I got two errors with your myell code;

My compiler is being stupid and wont let me post them at the moment. It said something like ’ expected, and not a statement’[/quote]
add a + to playername+ and it will work

[code] else if (command.startsWith(“myel”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >=1)
{

command.substring(5).replaceAll(“no-ip”, “imgay”);
command.substring(5).replaceAll(“servegame”, “imgay”);
command.substring(5).trim();

            if(muted == 1)
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
            else
	PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Mod]" +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5);
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Can you?
item.dc:creator: @sgt_yoshi sgt yoshi
item.description:
@sgt_yoshi wrote:

Wowzers, I got two errors with your myell code;

My compiler is being stupid and wont let me post them at the moment. It said something like ’ expected, and not a statement’

Trying yours now scott, one second[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 30, 2008, 12:30:42 PM[/size][hr][quote=“ScottCheese, post:5, topic:194515”][code]else if (command.startsWith(“myell”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
try {

		String announcement = command.substring(8);
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll ="[~!MOD!~]: "+command.substring(8);
		sendMessage("You have successfully sent an announcement.");

		} catch(Exception e) {
		sendMessage("Wrong syntax! Use ::myell [MOD].");
		}[/code][/quote]

Scott, I want it to be;

[MOD]Username: message

Read full topic

item.description:
@_O_Wowzers wrote:

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 15000000);
addItem(392, 1500);
sendMessage(“Get more food from the store owner:zeek”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“Why do you have to be greedy?”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName+ " is really greedy trying to type ::starter again");

}

}
[/code]

item.title: Can you?
item.dc:creator: @sgt_yoshi sgt yoshi
item.description:
@sgt_yoshi wrote:

Can someone post this command;

::starter

I really want to use it in my server.

Also, Here is the yell command;

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5)
{

command.substring(5).replaceAll(“no-ip”, “");
command.substring(5).replaceAll(“servegame”, "”);
command.substring(5).trim();

            if(muted == 1)
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
            else
	PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ ": " +command.substring(5);
}[/code]

I want to make another command, called “myell”. I want the player rights to be 1, and it does the same exact thing a yell command would do, but it says [MOD] before the username…would this work?

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“myell”) && command.length() > 5) && playerRights == 1)
{

command.substring(5).replaceAll(“no-ip”, “");
command.substring(5).replaceAll(“servegame”, "”);
command.substring(5).trim();

            if(muted == 1)
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
            else
	PlayerHandler.messageToAll =[MOD]playerName+ ": " +command.substring(5);
}

[/code]

If that doesn’t work, can someone please fix it for me so it will?

THANKS much.

Read full topic
